tool_description:
Free, Real-time Flight Status &
Global Aviation Data API
Flight tracker & airport timetable data web service
trusted by 5.000+ of the smartest companies
title: aviationstack

api_list.name: get
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://aviationstack1.p.rapidapi.com/api.aviationstack.com/v1/flights"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "aviationstack1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
